_gram:
({#ramate#}, but Paras. when
preceded by {#vi, A, pari#} and {#upa; reme#},
{#araMsta, araMsIt#} Par. {#raMsyate, raMtuM, rata#},)
_meanings:
{@--1@} To
be pleased or delighted, rejoice, be
gratified; {#rahasi ramate#} <ls>Māl. 3. 2</ls>,  
<ls>Ms. 2. 223</ls>; <ls>U. 2. 18.</ls>

{@--3@} To play, sport, dally,
amuse oneself with; {#rAjapriyAH#} 
{#kEraviRyo ramaMte maDupEH saha#} <ls>Bv. 1. 126</ls>
(where the next meaning is also
hinted); <ls>Bk. 6. 15</ls>, <ls n="Bk. 6.">67.</ls>
